title: shrI vAtApi
sahitya:
shrI vAtApi gaNapatiyE nin tiruvaDiyE sharaNam Om


anupallavi

  dEvAdi dEvan tyAgEshan tiruviLaiyADal shei tiruvArUr vaLar


caraNam    nambina pErk-kiha param iranDilum nal vAzhvum pErinbamum nalguma
tumbimukha perumAnE aDi tozhum toNDargaL vENDum varam taruvOnE
shambhuvuDan kamalAmbikai magizhum tanayanE dayAkaranE jagam pugazhum
kumbha munik-karuL kumaran mun tOnriya kOmAnE rAmadAsan uLam vaLar
